name: Christmas Rush (madrid2030)
description:
Give it support on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/608139762/ Christmas Rush  =======

Hello there! Welcome to Christmas Rush, my newest game! I worked on this more than 48 hours so please love, fave and follow still appreciated! :D 

====== 

⚠️ Double Click Green Flag for better Experience ⚠️ 

⏩ Fullscreen recomended ⏪ 

Feedback, Help , Positive ✅

Hate, F4F, Ads ❌

====== 

★ Story ★  

» It's time to give each person their Christmas Present! But... what's happening? There is something that is happening ... Things are not as planned. What! It is the evil star, who comes to destroy Christmas! But no, not this year. Who will defeat the evil star? You are the only one who can do it! 

====== 

★ Instructions ★

» Move with arrows keys or w,a,s,d 

» Shoot with spacebar 

» Shoot to Dark Stars 

» Collect Magic Powers! 

====== 

★ Magic Powers ★

» Shield: Blue - Adds you a Shield during 5 Seconds 

» Color: Red - Changes your color to Gold + Size -5 

» Curative: Green - If you have less than 3 Lives, it adds you one. 

====== 

★ Coins ★

 » Some coins can give you 5 points, and other coins not! 

» Also some coins will sound, but probably they don't give you 5 points! It's a mystery.... 

======
